hotel.name: Margaritaville Resort Orlando

content.name: Margaritaville Resort Orlando
content.virginView: This island inspired resort is situated in an excellent location, near to Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™, so you’re as close to the action as can be. On your arrival you’ll receive a complementary cocktail to help start your holiday as soon as possible. Between daily and nightly entertainment, family activities at the Fins Up Beach Club and splashing around in the pools, you will never be short of things to do. Grab a bite at the resorts exceptional restaurants and try Florida’s famed seafood, or load up on snacks for long days out at the theme parks. Whether you want a fun packed adventure or just the chance to slow life down and chill out, you’ll be able to have your holiday your way.
content.hotelDescription: This island inspired resort is situated in an excellent location, near to Walt Disney World Resort, Universal Orlando Resort™ and SeaWorld, you’re as close to the action as can be. On your arrival you’ll receive a complementary cocktail to help start your holiday as soon as possible. Between daily and nightly entertainment, family activities at the Fins Up Beach Club and splashing around in the pools, you will never be short of things to do. Grab a bite at the resorts exceptional restaurants and try Florida’s famed seafood, or load up on snacks for long days out at the theme parks. Whether you want a fun packed adventure or just the chance to slow life down and chill out, you’ll be able to have your holiday your way.
atAGlance: Island H2O Water Park, located next door
5 miles from Disney's Animal Kingdom theme park
Fins Up Beach Club; Complimentary scheduled transportation to Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando

hotel.name: Loews Portofino Bay Hotel at Universal Orlando

content.name: Loews Portofino Bay Hotel at Universal Orlando
content.virginView: Experience la dolce vita — the sweet life — at Loews Portofino Bay at Universal Orlando. Set on a stunning harbour, prepare to be transported to the charming, picturesque Italian seaside and cobblestoned streets. Sit and enjoy the views over the glistening harbour waters while sipping on a coffee. Taste traditional Italian food in one of the many restaurants. And, when the sun’s shining, jump into one of the pools to cool off. The parks are only a water taxi or shuttle bus away, and you’ll benefit from amazing extras like Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay.
content.hotelDescription: Experience la dolce vita — the sweet life — at Loews Portofino Bay, and prepare to be transported to the charming, picturesque Italian seaside and cobblestoned streets.
atAGlance: FREE* Universal Express Unlimited to skip the regular queues in Universal Studios Florida and Universal’s Islands of Adventure (ticket required)
Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks
3 swimming pools to choose from

hotel.name: Loews Royal Pacific Resort at Universal Orlando

content.name: Loews Royal Pacific Resort at Universal Orlando
content.virginView: Prepare to be transported to the South Seas when you arrive at Loews Royal Pacific Resort, and experience the wonder of enchanted islands such as Fiji, Bali and Hawaii without sailing halfway around the globe. Little ones will love it here — with a water play area, Kids’ Camp*, poolside games, and even character dining. And when it’s time to head to the parks, you’ll benefit from free transportation, Universal Express Unlimited** to skip the regular queues in Universal Studios Florida and Universal’s Islands of Adventure (valid theme park admission required), priority dining seating, and even Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ (ticket required, select attractions), and select attractions at Volcano Bay water park.
content.hotelDescription: Prepare to be transported to the South Seas when you arrive at the Loews Royal Pacific, and experience the wonder of enchanted islands such as Fiji, Bali and Hawaii without sailing halfway around the globe.
atAGlance: FREE* Universal Express Unlimited to skip the regular queues in Universal Studios Florida and Universal’s Islands of Adventure (ticket required)
Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks

hotel.name: Sheraton Vistana Villages

content.name: Sheraton Vistana Villages
content.virginView: At this impressive resort on the quieter, southern end of International Drive you can choose from either a One or Two Bedroom Apartment. These beautifully decorated apartments are just a 5-mile drive from Walt Disney World Resort and only around a 15-minute drive from Universal Orlando Resort™. When you are not sampling the delights of the parks, you can choose between three swimming pools including one with a cool pirate ship, waterfalls and rocks. Or enjoy tennis, table tennis or one of the many other pursuits available. There are organised activities for kids, too. Food wise, you'll find a lovely coffee shop and deli as well as the Breeze Bar and Grill which serves breakfast, lunch and dinner.
content.hotelDescription: These beautifully decorated apartments have a brilliant choice of three swimming pools! One has a cool pirate ship, plus there is tennis, table tennis and organised activities for everybody.
atAGlance: 1- and 2-Bedroom Apartments
3 swimming pools
Sports and activities

hotel.name: Universal's Aventura Hotel

content.name: Universal's Aventura Hotel
content.virginView: You'll be warmly welcomed the moment you walk through the front doors of Universal's Aventura Hotel. With a modern environment, open air spaces and sleek lines, the innovative architecture makes this hotel unlike any other. Kids will love the pool area, and there's even a virtual reality games room* they can enjoy. You'll enjoy exclusive benefits at Universal Orlando Resort including Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay, and complimentary transport to all three theme parks and Universal CityWalk.
content.hotelDescription: You'll be warmly welcomed the moment you walk through the front doors of Universal's Aventura Hotel. With a modern environment, open air spaces and sleek lines, the innovative architecture makes this hotel unlike any other. Kids will love the pool area, and there's even a virtual reality games room* they can enjoy. You'll enjoy exclusive benefits at Universal Orlando Resort including Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay, and complimentary transport to all three theme parks and Universal CityWalk. You're also just a short walk from Universal's Volcano Bay.
atAGlance: Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks
Bar 17 Bistro rooftop bar

hotel.name: Sheraton Vistana Resort

content.name: Sheraton Vistana Resort
content.virginView: This 135-acre resort has an astonishing array of sporting opportunities including tennis and mini-golf, as well as several swimming pools and whirlpools in which to splash around. There are lots of organised activities, which we reckon doubles your fun and gives you the chance to meet new friends. Whether its the sports or the theme parks that have tired you out, why not treat yourself to a massage - you are on holiday after all! Dining choices include Zimmies, Tacky Tiki Bar and Grill and Castaways. The apartments are attractively furnished, light and spacious, and the 2-Bedroom Apartments sleep up to 8 people.
content.hotelDescription: Welcome to 135 acres of swimming, tennis, mini-golf and more, with an array of organised activities. The apartments are attractively furnished, light and spacious, and there's a selection of eateries.
atAGlance: 5-min drive to Walt Disney World Resort
Numerous sports and activities to choose from
Spacious 1 and 2 Bed Apartments

keyFeatures.description: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
keyFeatures.name: close-to-walt-disney-world-resort

hotelLocation: Close to Walt Disney World Resort

hotel.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Dockside Inn and Suites

content.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Dockside Inn and Suites
content.virginView: A sister hotel to Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Surfside Inn and Suites, this hotel is a perfect blend of coastal retreat vibe with the fun and adrenaline fueled theme parks conveniently close by. Of course there are the exclusive added benefits of staying at a Universal hotel, including Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay up to one hour before the theme parks open (select attractions, valid theme park admission required), plus complimentary transport to and from all 3 theme parks and Universal CityWalk. 2-bedroom suites sleep six, and are a great base for larger families to unwind after all the thrills of the day.
content.hotelDescription: A sister hotel to Universal's Endless Summer Resort - Surfside Inn and Suites, this hotel is a perfect blend of coastal retreat vibe with the fun and adrenaline fueled Universal Studios conveniently close by.
atAGlance: Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks
Extra affordable value hotel

hotel.name: Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village

content.name: Courtyard Orlando Lake Buena Vista in the Marriott Village
content.virginView: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Courtyard by Marriott offering a high standard of furnishings and comfort. As a Walt Disney World Good Neighbor® Hotel, it couldn’t be easier for you to plan your trip to the parks, with a free shuttle service to selected parks. However, should you choose to stay on-site for the day, there are plentiful dining options and both indoor and outdoor pools to suit any weather.
content.hotelDescription: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value, the Courtyard by Marriott offering a higher standard of furnishings and comfort, while the SpringHill Suites have more of a studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area.
atAGlance: Free shuttle to nearby Walt Disney World Resort
3 dining options
Located close to Disney Springs
Spacious rooms for families

hotel.name: Sonesta ES Suites Lake Buena Vista

content.name: Sonesta ES Suites Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: Combining spacious suites with a fantastic location, and great value for money, the Sonesta ES Suites Lake Buena Vista will be a hit with parties of all sizes. You’re just a mile from the Walt Disney World entrance, so you can be hitting those thrills in no time, but you’ve also got plenty of facilities and space in your own suite should you wish to just chill out with a takeaway for the evening, or have a family BBQ. Self-parking is complimentary for Virgin Atlantic Holidays customers, and guests can jump on the shuttle service to nearby parks for a small daily fee - ideal for saving on parking! The friendly staff will be happy to point you in the direction of local restaurants in walking distance too, of which there are plenty! However, with the fully equipped kitchen you can also whip up your own meals in no time. And when you’re hot and tired from a day exploring all that Orlando has to offer, the outdoor pool will be very welcome for a refreshing dip!
atAGlance: Located in the Lake Buena Vista just one mile from the Walt Disney World® entrance
Spacious suites with fully equipped kitchens
Shuttle service available to Walt Disney World® and Universal Orlando

hotel.name: B Resort & Spa

content.name: B Resort & Spa
content.virginView: The B Resort & Spa is just a short shuttle ride away from all the fun and adventure of World Disney Resort, so you'll find yourselves right in the heart of the action. The family-friendly rooms and suites feature playful yet stylish décor and state of the art facilities. There is a great selection of culinary options available, from the causal poolside bar to the signature restaurant which features creative concepts by an internationally recognised restaurateur - guaranteed to satisfy and enthuse even the most refined palates. This is of course when you're not too busy out dining and being entertained in the parks, the options are endless!
atAGlance: Located within the gates of Walt Disney World Resort
Complimentary Shuttle to Walt Disney World Resort
B Indulged Spa
Waived resort fee for Virgin Atlantic Holidays' customers

hotel.name: Springhill Suites - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista

content.name: Springhill Suites - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the SpringHill Suites offering studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area, great for families and the extra space means you won't feel like you're on top of each other. There is complimentary shuttle access to selected parks, and a free buffet breakfast to fuel the whole family before a day exploring. The superb dining and entertainment choices of Lake Buena Vista and Downtown Disney are only minutes away, while the resort has its own Village Marketplace Food Court should you not feel like venturing out. Whichever hotel you decide best suits you, you'll know that you're in a great location near to both Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando® Resort, with one of Florida's best premium outlet malls on your doorstep!
content.hotelDescription: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value, the Courtyard by Marriott offering a higher standard of furnishings and comfort, while the SpringHill Suites have more of a studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area.
atAGlance: Close to the shops, bars, and restaurants at Disney Springs
Complimentary buffet breakfast
Free shuttle to Walt Disney World
All-suite hotel

hotel.name: Hyatt Regency Grand Cypress

content.name: Hyatt Regency Grand Cypress
content.virginView: There are far too many facilities at this marvellous 1,500-acre resort to detail here. The swimming pool is the kind that has kids gasping with wonder - waterfalls, grottos, whirlpools and a 124-ft long water slide tower, as well as a new water jet splash zone and rock climbing areas for kids, creates an aqueous wonderland. On the lake, you can practice kayaking, canoeing, or just simply pedal away toward the sunset. There is even a white sand beach for those waiting to sit back and relax, and 45 holes of top golf, with a pitch 'n' putt for non-golfers to enjoy. There are some great restaurants and bars; the pool bar, On the Rock, is located by Lake Windsong, offering views of the lake and the pool, four 60" TVs, a full service bar and food service options. Leave everything behind to enjoy the happiest of hours under palm tree canopies and moon-drenched evening skies at Four Flamingos, a Richard Blais Florida Kitchen that provides an immersive dining and drinking experience reminiscent of a dreamy, tropical oasis. Be one of the first to enjoy their newest recreational features: New Water slide, Water Jet Splash zone, rock climbing for kids and the pool bar!
content.hotelDescription: There are far too many facilities at this marvellous 1,500-acre resort to detail here. The swimming pool is the kind that has kids gasping with wonder waterfalls, grottos, whirlpools and a 124-ft long water slide tower, new water jet splash zone and rock climbing areas for kids creates an aqueous wonderland; and on the lake, you can practice kayaking, canoeing or just simply pedal away toward the sunset, there is even a white sand beach for those waiting to sit back and relax, and 45 holes of top golf, with a pitch 'n' putt for non-golfers to enjoy.
atAGlance: 5-minute drive to Walt Disney World Resort
124-ft long water slide tower and Water jet splash zone
Spa and fitness centre
Kids' activities programme

hotel.name: Sonesta ES Suites - International Drive

content.name: Sonesta ES Suites - International Drive
content.virginView: Sonesta ES Suites Orlando offers a convenient International Drive location, close to all of Orlando's attractions. Appealingly fresh and modern, all guest suites, public spaces, and dining options have been completely re-imagined. On offer are 1- and 2-bedroom suites, complimentary WiFi, an on-site Shoppe convenience store, and a lobby lounge with daily happy hour specials. Additional facilities include a fitness centre, heated swimming pool and jacuzzi. The cherry on top? There's also a complimentary shuttle to Disney World and Universal!
content.hotelDescription: Completely reimagined, Sonesta ES Suites Orlando offers a fresh modern look throughout the recently renovated hotel. This all-suite, courtyard-style hotel is perfect for families — with rooms that easily accommodate 6-8 people.
atAGlance: Excellent location on International Drive
Complimentary self-parking
Complimentary shuttle to Walt Disney World and Universal Orlando
Lobby lounge with daily happy hour

hotel.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort-Surfside Inn and Suites

content.name: Universal's Endless Summer Resort-Surfside Inn and Suites
content.virginView: With a chilled beach vibe and a lakefront setting, Universal's Surfside Inn and Suites boasts rates for even the most budget-conscious guests. Your room will have a relaxed feel, and there's even larger suites to sleep all the family. You'll enjoy exclusive benefits like Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, valid theme park admission required), and complimentary transportation to and from all 3 theme parks and Universal CityWalk.
content.hotelDescription: With a chilled beach vibe and a lakefront setting, Universal's Surfside Inn and Suites boasts rates for even the most budget-conscious guests.

hotel.name: JW Marriott Orlando Bonnet Creek Resort and Spa

content.name: JW Marriott Orlando Bonnet Creek Resort and Spa
content.virginView: When you’re booking a trip to the theme parks in Orlando, you don’t imagine that you’d be able to find a haven of relaxation and luxury right in the centre – well here it is. The JW Marriott Orlando Bonnet Creek Resort & Spa sits within the gates of Walt Disney World Resort, with a shuttle service taking you to the park gates in no time at all. The action is right around you, but when you step into the resort you’l find yourself in a 75-acre protected oasis where you can recuperate. The rooms have a sleek, sophisticated design, with ample space in the family suites for larger groups. And from the family suite accommodations to the rock climbing, garden golf, and the activity schedule at the kids club, there’s always something to keep the little ones entertained, rain or shine, whatever their hobbies. Whilst they’re occupied in resort, be sure to visit the spa by JW, inspired by the rejuvenating warmth of the ‘Sunshine State’, these treatments will have you feeling your best in no time. Disney Springs is just 5 miles away, with its wide variety of restaurants and bars on offer, but the JW Marriott have plenty of their own to save you the trip on those tired evenings. illume is a particular favourite for guests, located on the 9th floor, giving you a great vantage point for the Disney fireworks whilst enjoying Asian inspired tapas and fresh sushi. For those chilled poolside afternoons, check out the happy hour at Unreserved Beer Garden, where you can enjoy a range of craft beers or a chilled glass of rose in the late afternoon sun.
atAGlance: Within the gates of Walt Disney World Resort, with fireworks view from the roof terrace
9,920 sq ft luxury spa
Complimentary shuttle service to Walt Disney World Resort
Expansive hotel suites for families
Rock climbing and mini golf

hotel.name: Universal's Cabana Bay Beach Resort

content.name: Universal's Cabana Bay Beach Resort
content.virginView: Enjoy vibrant, retro-style with rooms and suites brilliantly designed for family-sized fun and affordability. Relax and play, surrounded by amazing iconic architecture inspired by classic Florida beach resorts of the 1950s and 60s. Two towers offer the best views of Universal’s Volcano Bay water theme park. You’ll enjoy endless family fun with two massive pools including a water slide and a lazy river, 10-lane bowling alley*, and Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay up to one hour before the theme parks open (select attractions, valid theme park admission required). The whole family can stay comfortably in family suites that sleep up to six, complete with a kitchenette, or relax in one of the hotel’s standard rooms that sleep up to four. You're just a short walk to Universal's Volcano Bay and a quick, free shuttle ride to Universal Studios Florida and Universal's Islands of Adventure, as well as Universal CityWalk entertainment complex.
content.hotelDescription: Experience the excitement of Universal Orlando Resort in a whole new way at Universal’s Cabana Bay Beach Resort, with more rooms and more fun for less.
atAGlance: Complimentary self-parking
Exclusive late check-out available until 1.00pm
Two complimentary inflatable rubber rings per room
Complimentary welcome drink; Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry PotterȒ

hotel.name: Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek

content.name: Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek
content.virginView: The one that’s got everybody talking, the Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek is an extraordinary hotel with a cool, hip vibe and superb amenities. For a start, there’s a 3-acre lazy river pool with an exciting waterslide for all ages. There’s also a fantastic kids' club packed with activities including water sports, bike tours, golfing, treasure hunts and arts and crafts. Whilst younger members of the family are kept more than busy, head to the spa for an indulgent but well-deserved treatment. When it comes to dining, there are 12 bars and restaurants to choose from serving delicious dishes from around the world. At the Hilton there’s La Luce for Italian inspired cuisine and Harvest Bistro serving American classics. Pop over the road to the Waldorf Astoria® and you can dine on steaks at the Bull & Bear. Disney’s theme parks are all very close by with amazing views of the Magic Kingdom Park, Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios from the hotel rooms! What’s more, there’s complimentary transport to all of them, so leave the car behind and simply enjoy!
content.hotelDescription: The one that’s got everybody talking, the Signia by Hilton Orlando Bonnet Creek is an extraordinary hotel with a cool, hip vibe and superb amenities. For a start, there’s a 3-acre lazy river pool with an exciting waterslide for all ages. There’s also a fantastic kids' club packed with activities. Whilst younger members of the family are kept more than busy, head to the spa for an indulgent but well-deserved treatment. Disney’s theme parks are all very close by with amazing views of the Magic Kingdom Park, Epcot and Disney's Hollywood Studios from the hotel rooms! What’s more, there’s complimentary transport to all of them, so leave the car behind and simply enjoy!
atAGlance: Located minutes from the Disney theme parks with a complimentary shuttle service
12 restaurants and bars
18-hole championship golf course
3-acre lazy river pool

hotel.name: Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld

content.name: Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld
content.virginView: This plush hotel has a wide variety of facilities and activities including the R Aqua Zone, an interactive waterpark with two waterslides as well as two splash and play areas. Golfers can enjoy a round or two on the 18-hole Championship golf course nearby, while those interested in relaxing can lounge by the huge outdoor pool or take a dip in the fizzing Jacuzzi to wind down. There is an incredible choice of restaurants on site — ranging from fresh seafood to great steaks. Kids will love the play area, while adults can have fun in the Boardwalk Sports Bar.
content.hotelDescription: The Renaissance Orlando is perfectly located on International Drive. This plush, spacious hotel has oodles of restaurants, facilities and activities, including a sparkling, resort style pool.
atAGlance: Great location on International Drive
R Aqua Zone
Large outdoor pool and kids' pool

hotel.name: Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort

content.name: Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort Area is located within walking distance of Disney Springs®, an excellent choice to enjoy all 150 amenities on offer. You’ll also have complimentary transportation to the Disney Parks® and Universal Studios that’s just a short distance away. After an exciting day at the most magical place on Earth, you can rest up in the comfy of your room, with beautiful views of the lake or the courtyard and feel the warm Florida breeze.
content.hotelDescription: Located within walking distance of Disney Springs™, the Wyndham Garden Lake Buena Vista provides a great base in a great location with entertainment, dining and shopping right on your doorstep. As part of the Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Resort, it shares the wide range of facilities including an aquatic playground and swimming pool with a spacious sundeck area and sporting activities such as tennis and basketball.
atAGlance: Complimentary transportation to Disney Parks® and early access included
Located opposite Disney Springs
2 swimming pools and hot tub

hotel.name: Waldorf Astoria Orlando

content.name: Waldorf Astoria Orlando
content.virginView: Part pit-stop for theme park adrenaline seekers, part luxury hideaway - the Waldorf Astoria has something around every corner to keep you relaxed and entertained. Take a dip in one of the pools, visit the spa and relax in the Jacuzzi, or even have a round of golf on the 18-hole course. Kids are kept busy at the kids’ club, and that’s all before you even think about those famous theme parks. Walt Disney World Resort is a short drive away, and by being a guest here, you get extras thrown in like extra magic hours and free transportation to and from the parks.
content.hotelDescription: Part pit-stop for theme park adrenaline seekers, part luxury hideaway. The Waldorf Astoria has something around every corner to keep you relaxed and entertained.
atAGlance: Close to Walt Disney World Resort
12 bars and restaurants
2 swimming pools
WA Kids Club
18-hole golf course

salesMessages.name: Waldorf Astoria Orlando Luxe Benefits 2022
salesMessages.description:
Stay before 31 Dec '22 and receive the following benefits:

A discount card/pass which provides a 15% discount off all Food & Beverage items excluding Bull & Bear and La Luce

2 Children under the age of 9 years eat free from the children's menus in Oscar's Brasserie or Harvest, Zeta when dining with one adult

Receive access to Disney Extra Magic Hours, valid with a valid Walt Disney World Theme Park ticket

Guaranteed late check-out on last day until 1pm

hotel.name: Doubletree by Hilton Orlando at SeaWorld

content.name: Doubletree by Hilton Orlando at SeaWorld
content.virginView: This hotel is conveniently located half way between Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™, it is the perfect contrast of incredibly convenient location and contemporary accommodation. You really are spoilt for choice around the hotel's 28 acres. The kids will love the free mini-golf, two large swimming pools and games room; plenty to keep them happy when they're not at the theme parks. Laguna is the main restaurant, with an atmosphere that is enlivened by regular seasonal entertainment (not to mention their tropical cocktails!).
content.hotelDescription: This hotel is conveniently located half way between Walt Disney World Resort and Universal Orlando Resort™, it is the perfect contrast of incredibly convenient location and contemporary accommodation. The kids will love the free mini-golf, two large swimming pools and games room; plenty to keep them happy when you are having a relaxing break from the theme parks.
atAGlance: Recently renovated resort-inspired oasis
Complimentary self-parking for Virgin Holidays guests
2 swimming pools

hotel.name: Hard Rock Hotel at Universal Orlando

content.name: Hard Rock Hotel at Universal Orlando
content.virginView: As soon as you step through the front door of the Hard Rock Hotel®, you’ll feel like a rock ‘n’ roll icon. With little musical touches throughout the corridors and on the walls, you’ll be transported to Rockstar heaven. When it comes to the fun part there’s a huge pool, a sandy beach, and even water jets and a slide pool-side. But the music hasn’t been forgotten — dip your head under the water and hear the beat. You’re not far from the parks, and you also get exclusive benefits thrown in including Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay (select attractions, valid theme park admission required).
content.hotelDescription: As soon as you step through the front door of the Hard Rock Hotel® at Universal Orlando, you’ll feel like a rock ‘n’ roll icon. With little musical touches throughout the corridors and on the walls, you’ll be transported to Rockstar heaven.
atAGlance: FREE* Universal Express Unlimited to skip the regular queues in Universal Studios Florida and Universal’s Islands of Adventure (ticket required)
Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks
Just a short walk from Universal Studios and Islands of Adventure

salesMessage.details: Stay Longer: Book by 31 Dec 2023 for travel between 1 Jan '22–31 Dec '23 and receive the following discounts on accomodation costs: Stay 7 nights or more and receive up to 30% off. Any applicable offers have been calculated into the prices shown. Offers may not be combinable

hotel.name: Fairfield Inn - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista

content.name: Fairfield Inn - In Marriott Village at Lake Buena Vista
content.virginView: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value. And If somebody was to offer you a hotel that provides complimentary breakfast and is just 3 minutes drive from Walt Disney World, with a complimentary shuttle to drop you to the door, it would sound too good to be true. It’s not – it’s here! The bunk beds in the family suites will be a hit with the kids, as will the games room and outdoor pool for those moments when you’re not out exploring in the parks. The superb dining and entertainment choices of Downtown Disney are only minutes away,  and it’s not just great for Disney, you're close to all the attractions on International Drive and a short hop from the Orlando outlets.
content.hotelDescription: The Marriott Village is a wonderful combination of 3 quality hotels in 1 resort, giving you the benefit of facilities at all 3 hotels for 1 great price! Each hotel gives you a different experience, with the Fairfield Inn providing a quality stay for those looking for great value, the Courtyard by Marriott offering a higher standard of furnishings and comfort, while the SpringHill Suites have more of a studio apartment feel with a combined bedroom and living area.
atAGlance: Close to the shops, bars, and restaurants at Disney Springs
Complimentary buffet breakfast
Family suites with bunk beds
Free shuttle to Walt Disney World

hotel.name: Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort Area

content.name: Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Resort
content.virginView: Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Disney Springs Resort Area is an official Disney World® Hotel so you’ll be right near all the action. Just opposite Disney Springs®, this prime location offers you over 150 shops, restaurants and attractions for you to explore. You’ll also be only a short distance away from the likes of Magic Kingdom and Hollywood Studios so you'll be in the queues for the latest rides in no time. This resort also has its own aquatic area, with two pools, a jacuzzi and water playground for the little ones, or visit the courts and try your hand at basketball or sand volleyball. There’s so much to do, you’ll never be short of fun and excitement.
content.hotelDescription: Located in the Disney Springs™ area, the popular Wyndham Lake Buena Vista Resort offers a wide range of facilities including an aquatic playground and swimming pool with a spacious sundeck area and sporting activities such as tennis and basketball.
atAGlance: Complimentary transportation to Disney Parks
Located opposite Disney Springs
Lake-house themed décor
Kid’s water playground

hotel.name: Loews Sapphire Falls Resort at Universal Orlando

content.name: Loews Sapphire Falls Resort at Universal Orlando
content.virginView: Loews Sapphire Falls at Universal Orlando Resort will take you to a paradise in the heart of the tropics. Blue waterfalls cascade over lush grounds, and in the distance the calming sounds of steel drums call you to take in the scenic water views. Ease into ‘island time’ and let go. Kids will love the pool, complete with water slide, games, and somewhere to grab some food without stepping too far from the lounger. And when it’s time to go and explore the parks, you’ll enjoy exclusive benefits like Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal’s Volcano Bay (select attractions, valid theme park admission required), and complimentary transport to Universal's 3 theme parks and Universal CityWalk via water taxi and shuttle bus. It's a great way to experience all that Universal Orlando Resort has to offer.
content.hotelDescription: Loews Sapphire Falls will take you to a paradise in the heart of the tropics. Blue waterfalls cascade over lush grounds, and in the distance the calming sounds of steel drums call you to take in the scenic water views. Ease into ‘island time’ and let go.
atAGlance: Early Park Admission† to The Wizarding World of Harry Potter™ and Universal's Volcano Bay (select attractions, ticket required)
Free transportation to and from the parks
The largest pool of all the Universal Orlando hotels
